article_text:
(AP Photo/Lee Jin-man)

Reports on wearables and related fitness devices haven’t generally agreed upon where the market is going and what the eventual volume of sales will be.

But that hasn’t dampened the industry’s ardor for new products. Thus, a new report from Juniper Research should give heart to those making devices to track fitness on a personal level.

article_summary:
(AP Photo/Lee Jin-man)Reports on wearables and related fitness devices haven’t generally agreed upon where the market is going and what the eventual volume of sales will be.
Thus, a new report from Juniper Research should give heart to those making devices to track fitness on a personal level.
But that hasn’t dampened the industry’s ardor for new products.
